response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you, just like it does for me. This exceptional item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $950,000. I understand that such an investment is significant, and I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and guide you through the process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
